singapore.eligibility_criteria: Singapore-incorporated company, minimum 2 years in business, UOB banking relationship required
singapore.application_process: Apply via UOB Business Internet Banking or visit branch
singapore.collateral_required: Personal guarantee and/or company assets, property valuation may be required

singapore.eligibility_criteria: Singapore-incorporated company, minimum 3 years operation, DBS business account holder, Singapore citizen/PR director
singapore.application_process: Apply online through DBS iBanking or visit business banking center
singapore.collateral_required: May require business assets or personal guarantee for larger amounts

singapore.loan_name: Enterprise Financing Scheme - SME Working Capital
singapore.eligibility_criteria: Local shareholding ≥30%, annual sales turnover ≤SGD $100M, government risk-sharing up to 70%
singapore.application_process: Apply through OCBC business banking with Enterprise Singapore endorsement
singapore.collateral_required: Reduced collateral requirements due to government risk-sharing

singapore.eligibility_criteria: Minimum 3 years operation, Maybank account holder, Singapore citizen/PR director, annual turnover ≤SGD $100M
singapore.application_process: Apply at Maybank branch or call business hotline during office hours
singapore.collateral_required: Personal guarantee typically required, additional security for larger amounts

singapore.eligibility_criteria: Singapore-incorporated SME, commitment to sustainability performance targets (SPTs)
singapore.application_process: Apply through CIMB business banking with Bureau Veritas verification
singapore.collateral_required: Business assets or personal guarantee may be required

singapore.eligibility_criteria: Import/export businesses, established trade relationships, Singapore-incorporated company
singapore.application_process: Apply through Standard Chartered trade finance team
singapore.collateral_required: Trade receivables or inventory as collateral

singapore.eligibility_criteria: Minimum 2 years in business, HSBC relationship, growth or expansion projects
singapore.application_process: Apply through HSBC business relationship manager
singapore.collateral_required: Business assets, property, or personal guarantee

United States.eligibility_criteria: U.S.-based, for-profit businesses with reasonable owner equity investment
United States.application_process: Apply via SBA-partner bank, followed by underwriting and SBA approval

United States.eligibility_criteria: Startups or small businesses in underserved communities
United States.application_process: Apply directly through CDFIs or SBA microloan lenders
United States.collateral_required: Sometimes, personal guarantee may be required

United States.eligibility_criteria: Minimum 2 years in business, $100,000 annual revenue
United States.application_process: Online application with document upload and credit check

United States.eligibility_criteria: For-profit U.S. businesses, 2+ years in operation, good credit history

United States.application_process: Apply via Chase banker or online account

united_kingdom.eligibility_criteria: New businesses or those trading for less than 24 months, UK residents
united_kingdom.application_process: Apply through accredited delivery partners, includes mentorship support

united_kingdom.eligibility_criteria: UK-based SMEs, viable business proposition, 80% government guarantee
united_kingdom.application_process: Apply through participating lenders with government backing
united_kingdom.collateral_required: Reduced requirements due to government guarantee

united_kingdom.eligibility_criteria: Established businesses with 2+ years trading history
united_kingdom.application_process: Online application with relationship manager support

united_kingdom.eligibility_criteria: UK registered companies, minimum 2 years trading
united_kingdom.application_process: Branch or online application with business banking relationship
united_kingdom.collateral_required: May be required for larger amounts

united_kingdom.eligibility_criteria: Established UK businesses with existing banking relationship

canada.eligibility_criteria: Canadian businesses, viable business plan, adequate cash flow
canada.application_process: Online application with BDC advisor consultation
canada.collateral_required: May be required, personal guarantee typical

canada.eligibility_criteria: Canadian small businesses, maximum $10M annual revenue
canada.collateral_required: Assets being financed serve as collateral

canada.eligibility_criteria: Established Canadian businesses, good credit history
canada.application_process: Branch application with business banking advisor
canada.collateral_required: May require business assets or personal guarantee

canada.eligibility_criteria: Canadian incorporated businesses, minimum 2 years operation
canada.application_process: Meet with business advisor for application review
canada.collateral_required: Security may be required based on loan amount

canada.eligibility_criteria: Canadian businesses with established banking relationship
canada.application_process: Apply through BMO business banking center
canada.collateral_required: Varies by loan amount and business profile

india.application_process: Apply at SBI branch or online portal
Online application with document upload and verification

india.eligibility_criteria: MSMEs, collateral-free loans with CGTMSE guarantee
india.application_process: Apply through Bank of Baroda MSME branch
india.collateral_required: No collateral for loans up to ₹2 crore

india.application_process: Apply through ICICI Bank branch with Stand-Up India portal

india.eligibility_criteria: MSMEs affected by COVID-19, operational as of Feb 2020
india.application_process: Online application through Axis Bank MSME portal

brazil.eligibility_criteria: Brazilian companies, investment projects, job creation
brazil.collateral_required: Real guarantees required for larger amounts

brazil.eligibility_criteria: Micro and small enterprises, revenue up to R$4.8M
brazil.application_process: Apply through Banco do Brasil digital channels

brazil.eligibility_criteria: Active companies with banking relationship, good credit history
brazil.application_process: Apply through Itaú business banking or app
brazil.collateral_required: May require personal guarantee or assets

brazil.eligibility_criteria: Small and medium enterprises, minimum 1 year operation
brazil.application_process: Online application through Santander business portal

brazil.eligibility_criteria: Small businesses, entrepreneurs affected by economic crisis
brazil.application_process: Apply at Caixa branches or authorized correspondents
brazil.collateral_required: No collateral, covered by guarantee fund

australia.eligibility_criteria: Australian registered business, minimum 2 years trading history
australia.application_process: Apply online or through business banking manager
australia.collateral_required: Security may be required depending on loan amount

australia.bank_name: Australia and New Zealand Banking Group
australia.eligibility_criteria: Established Australian businesses with good credit history
australia.application_process: Apply through ANZ business banking or online portal

australia.application_process: Apply through NAB business specialist or online
australia.collateral_required: Security requirements vary by loan size

australia.collateral_required: Business assets or property may be required

australia.eligibility_criteria: SMEs purchasing business equipment or vehicles
australia.application_process: Online application with quick approval process
australia.collateral_required: Equipment being financed serves as security

france.eligibility_criteria: French SMEs, innovation or development projects, co-financing required
france.application_process: Apply through partner banks with Bpifrance guarantee

france.eligibility_criteria: French registered businesses, minimum 2 years trading
france.application_process: Apply through BNP Paribas business advisor

france.eligibility_criteria: French SMEs with viable business model
French companies affected by economic difficulties
france.application_process: Apply through participating banks with state guarantee
france.collateral_required: No additional collateral due to state guarantee

Germany.collateral_required: Adequate security required for larger amounts
